text: "How did you hear about the position?" When Hillary Clinton stopped by "The Tonight Show" Jimmy Fallon had some important questions for her. "I was just wondering does Donald Trump intimidate you?" "Can we do a Snapchat?" (Obviously.) And then they got down to business. Jimmy took it upon himself to interview Hillary for the biggest job in the world—and he took the role seriously. "Howd you hear about the position?" "Are you willing to relocate?" Watch the full segment  .
